attributes.action: No more live rugby on ITV. Their presentation and punditry is woeful
attributes.additional_details: Review the purchase process and identify whether quality of product is included, or whether it is just down to who pays more. If this is the case then adjust, so that the quality of product is paramount for the viewing public.
attributes.background: Clearly, the process for allocations of viewing contracts is floored. The product provided by ITV is lacking in insight, entertainment and quality.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Broadcasting decisions are a matter for individual broadcasters and not the UK Government or Parliament.
